product_name: The North Face Apex Elevation Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Suitable for everyday wear, The North Face Apex Elevation Jacket for men keeps you comfortable with both 4-way stretch and warm PrimaLoft(R) Eco synthetic insulation. Apex Universal soft-shell fabric features a durable water repellent finish and great wind resistance. Ultra-warm, soft PrimaLoft Eco insulation feels like goose down but continues to work even if wet; 100g of insulation warms your core; slightly less in the sleeves. Removable, fully adjustable, insulated hood; brushed collar lining. Hem drawcord and non-abrasive, rip-and-stick adjustable cuffs. The North Face Apex Elevation Jacket has zip hand pockets and a secure Napoleon-style chest pockets. Standard fit allows a layer underneath. Closeout.
short_description: Suitable for everyday wear, The North Face Apex Elevation Jacket for men keeps you comfortable with both 4-way stretch and warm PrimaLoft(R) Eco synthetic insulation.
